name: islandora-cwrc-writer
description: A wrapper to use CWRC-Writer with Islandora.
author: Andrew MacDonald

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cwrc-writer && npm run copyfiles && npm run build:js
scripts.build:cwrc-writer: cd "node_modules/cwrc-writer-base" && npm run build && npm run build-scoped-css -- --global-var="parentId=#cwrc_wrapper"
scripts.copyfiles: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:css
scripts.build:js: mkdirp build/js && browserify js/app.js --standalone GitWriter > build/js/app.js --verbose -g babelify -g deamdify
scripts.debugbuild:js: mkdirp build/js && browserify js/app.js --standalone GitWriter > build/js/app.js --debug --verbose -g babelify -g deamdify
scripts.watch: watchify js/app.js --debug --standalone GitWriter -o build/js/app.js --verbose -g babelify -g deamdify
